summary: slightly modified texture for steel armor and shield
descriptionHtml:
Just did some minor adjustments to the steel armor set. The vanilla version looks washed out and like some plastic trash that is screwed together.

I changed the colors to be more like the color of worn steel, and removed a bunch of the screws. What are they screwed into, anyway? Screwing metal to leather and fur isn\'t very practical.

Installation: Copy \'Data\' folder into your Skyrim directory
author: kevinwastaken
